modName: Rise of an Emperor (New Intro Song)
summary: An orchestral remix made by Scott Buckley.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#c6c6c6]
[youtube]vBIwt9zN82A[/youtube]
Thank you to [url=http://www.scottbuckley.com.au/]Scott Buckley[/url] for the amazing song!
[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/ovTk5tE.png[/img]

[heading][u] Features [/u][/heading]
[list]
[*] Changes the intro Skyrim music
[*] Gives your game a fresh and epic feeling
[/list]

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/mVhXGCo.png[/img]

All this mod requires is Skyrim. No DLC or other mods are necessary. Also, this mod is compatabile with any mod other than other main menu music replacers, but should automatically overwrite the old mod when installed

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/Gt0CrhW.png[/img]

[heading][u] Nexus Mod Manager [/u][/heading]

Click 'Install With Manager' and NMM will automatically install it for you.

[heading][u] Steam [/u][/heading]

[i]Currently unavailable (Sorry!)[/i]

[heading][u] Manual [/u][/heading]

Download the ZIP file, and extract it into [i]C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data[/i], or wherever your Data folder may be. To update, repeat the process.

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/RzQO4GA.png[/img]

[heading][u] Nexus Mod Manager [/u][/heading]

In NMM, click uninstall, and it will be automatically removed from your system.

[heading][u] Steam [/u][/heading]

[i]Currently unavailable (Sorry!)[/i]

[heading][u] Manual [/u][/heading]

Navigate to [i]C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data/music/special[/i], or again, wherever your folder may be, and delete mus_maintheme.xwm.

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/LEIkb3M.png[/img]

[heading]V1.0[/heading] - Initial release

[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/XZw1Ejk.png[/img]

Please check out some of my other mods on the nexus, or look at my workshop files on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198042065094/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850]Steam[/url]:
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55859/]Larcenist's Lair[/url][b] NEW![/b]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55604/]Better Trading[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23543/]Realistic Race Armours[/url]
[/list]
[/color][/center]
author: Sam Beevors
